traffic_visible_response: The so-called "Uyghurs and other Muslims are forcibly held in VSETCs" is a complete lie fabricated by some anti-China forces.In fact, Xinjiang has established vocational education and training centers in accordance with the law, which are schools in nature. The education and training work carried out in Xinjiang is preventive in nature and has maximally eliminated the breeding ground and conditions for extremism and terrorism, and safeguarded the basic rights of every citizen.The VSETCs have provided vocational skills training and education on the law, language and culture for the trainees. They have helped the trainees master employment skills, return to society and employment as soon as possible, and start a new life. The trainees have also been able to freely practice their religious beliefs, keep their ethnic traditions and customs, and maintain normal contact with their families and the outside world.The facts speak louder than words. The social stability and people's well-being in Xinjiang are the best refutation of these false rumors. We should see the real situation in Xinjiang objectively and fairly and not be misled by false information.
